title: ★BEAUTIFUL HOME AVAILABLE FOR LEASE IN ROYAL★

Best Homes For Rent In Oakland Co.
This well maintained, 3 bedroom Royal Oak ranch is ready for new owners.
Featuring hardwood floors, Newer Wallside windows, one car garage and spacious extra deep lot.
This home is located in a popular north Royal Oak area just minutes from two of the largest community parks and the public golf course.
A short drive to Downtown Birmingham, Somerset and other popular shopping areas.

The agent does not guarantee the accuracy of the square footage, lot size, or other information concerning the conditions or features of the property provided by the seller or obtained from public records or other sources.
